tool.name: groups
tool.command:
parsec groups create_group --group_name "$group_name"
#if $user_ids --user_ids "$user_ids" #end if #if $role_ids --role_ids "$role_ids" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: group_name
input.label: group_name
input.help: A name for the new group

input.name: user_ids
input.help: A list of encoded user IDs to add to the new group

input.name: role_ids
input.help: A list of encoded role IDs to add to the new group
